title: About Me
text:
Hello! My name is Litta Jose Thottam and I am a masters student at Europa-Universitat Viadrina.


Prior to my masters,I did my Bachelors in Economics from Mahatma Gandhi University,Kerala,India.
Currently I am Pursuing International Business Administration.



I am currently a werkstudent at IHP,Frankfurt(Oder) as marketing strategist.
Thanks for checking out my web site!
